MobileAlert.title: Please note
MobileAlert.text: This area of the website is not designed for use on smartphones.

LandingPage.title: Lexical Information System Austria (LIÖ)
LandingPage.description: The Lexical Information System Austria (LIÖ) focuses on lexical variation in Austria, both past and present. This means you will find information here regarding the vocabulary used in Austria.
LandingPage.links-title: Currently, LIÖ provides access to information, data, and results from three research projects:

wboe.title: WBÖ
wboe.description: Dictionary of historical Bavarian Dialects in Austria
wboe.content: Dialect materials and dictionary entries concerning the historical Bavarian dialects of Austria, South Tyrol, and other 'language islands' (primarily 20th century).

lexvad.title: LexVAD20
lexvad.description: Lexical Variation of Austrian Dialects in the 20th Century
lexvad.content: Dialect data and linguistic maps based on the Austrian questionnaires from the 'Deutscher Wortatlas' (FWF 10.55776/PAT1412824).

lexat.title: LexAT21
lexat.description: Atlas of Lexical Variation in Austria in the 21st Century
lexat.content: Data and linguistic maps of contemporary vocabulary in Austria (ranging from standard language to dialects).
